sentences.en: It's fifteen thirty hours.
sentences.cn: 现在是15点30分。

means.word_mean: 不确定的一段时间, 某一时刻

sentences.en: Who can be calling on me at this late hour?
sentences.cn: 谁会在这么晚的时间来拜访我呢?

means.word_mean: 固定时间, 上班时间

sentences.en: Office hours are from 9 am. to 5 pm.
sentences.cn: 办公时间从上午九点到下午五点。

jx.jx_en_mean: most of the time, especially outside the time considered usual for something
jx.jx_cn_mean: （尤指在通常做某事的时间之外的）大部分时间

lj.lj_ly: teenagers expect to be allowed to stay out &B{to all hours}.
lj.lj_ls: 青少年希望被允许大部分时间待在外面。

jx.jx_en_mean: do the same thing, typically getting up and going to bed, late or at the same time every day
jx.jx_cn_mean: 每天做同一件事情（多指起床和睡觉）很晚（或有规律）

jx.jx_en_mean: at an exact hour, or on each hour, of the day or night
jx.jx_cn_mean: （白天、晚上）在整点，在每一小时

jx.jx_en_mean: after a period of one hour

entry.def: An hour is a period of sixty minutes.

example.ex: They waited for about two hours...
I only slept about half an hour that night.
example.tran: 我那天晚上只睡了大约半个小时。

entry.def: People say that something takes or lasts hours to emphasize that it takes or lasts a very long time, or what seems like a very long time.
A clock that strikes the hour strikes when it is exactly one o'clock, two o'clock, and so on.
You can refer to a particular time or moment as a particular hour .

example.ex: The gathering storm had made the day even darker than was usual at this hour.
example.tran: 即将到来的暴风雨使得天空看起来比平时这个时候更昏暗。

entry.def: If you refer, for example, to someone's hour of need or hour of happiness, you are referring to the time in their life when they are or were experiencing that condition or feeling.

example.ex: He recalled her devotion to her husband during his hour of need.
example.tran: 他回忆起她在丈夫困难之时的忠贞奉献。

example.ex: ...the darkest hour of my professional life.
example.tran: 我职业生涯中最黑暗的时期

entry.def: You can refer to the period of time during which something happens or operates each day as the hours during which it happens or operates.
entry.tran: （每天发生或进行某事的）特定时间，固定时间

example.ex: Phone us on this number during office hours.
example.tran: 上班时间打这个电话给我们。

entry.def: If you refer to the hours involved in a job, you are talking about how long you spend each week doing it and when you do it.

example.tran: 我的工作时间相当不固定。

example.ex: The job was easy; the hours were good.
example.tran: 这份工作很轻松，工作时间也很合适。

entry.def: If you do something after hours, you do it outside normal business hours or the time when you are usually at work.
entry.tran: 下班后;营业（或办公、学习）时间以后

example.ex: ...a local restaurant where steel workers unwind after hours...
example.tran: 钢厂工人下班后去放松一下的当地餐馆

example.ex: Daly kept this school open after hours so it doubled as a community center.
example.tran: 戴利在学生放学后继续开放学校，把它兼作社区中心。

entry.def: If you say that something happens at all hours of the day or night, you disapprove of it happening at the time that it does or as often as it does.
entry.tran: 在（某一时段的）任何时刻

example.ex: She didn't want her fourteen-year-old daughter coming home at all hours of the morning.
example.tran: 她不希望自己14岁的女儿凌晨才回家。

example.ex: ...a neighbour's car alarm going off at all hours of the day and night.
example.tran: 邻居的汽车警报器没日没夜响个不停。

entry.def: If something happens in the early hours or in the small hours, it happens in the early morning after midnight.

example.ex: Gibbs was arrested in the early hours of yesterday morning.
example.tran: 吉布斯于昨天凌晨被捕。

entry.def: If you say that someone does something hour after hour, you are emphasizing that they do it continually for a long time.

example.ex: He and my mom were arguing every night, hour after hour.
example.tran: 他和我妈妈每天晚上都吵个不停。

entry.def: If something happens on the hour, it happens every hour at, for example, nine o'clock, ten o'clock, and so on, and not at any number of minutes past an hour.
If you want to state the time exactly, you can give a number of minutes followed by before the hour or past the hour .
entry.tran: 整点差…分/ 整点过…分

entry.def: Something that happens out of hours happens at a time that is not during the usual hours of business or work.
entry.tran: 在通常营业（或工作、学习）时间之外

example.ex: Teachers refused to run out of hours sports matches because they weren't being paid.
example.tran: 教师拒绝课余安排体育比赛，因为他们不会获得薪酬。

means.word_mean: 1. a period of time equal to 1/24th of a day;

sentences.sentence: "the job will take more than an hour"

means.word_mean: 4. distance measured by the time taken to cover it;

sentences.sentence: "we live an hour from the airport"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French ure, via Latin from Greek hōra 'season, hour'

sentences.cn: 我们希望一小时内到达那里。
sentences.en: We hope to be there within the hour (= in less than an hour) .

sentences.cn: 我们比纽约早四个小时。
sentences.en: We're four hours ahead of New York (= referring to the time difference) .

sentences.cn: 到芝加哥需要两小时。
sentences.en: Chicago is two hours away (= it takes two hours to get there) .

sentences.cn: 开车到约克不会超过一小时。
sentences.en: York was within an hour's drive.

sentences.cn: 最高时速为120英里。
sentences.en: Top speed is 120 miles per hour .

sentences.cn: 最低工资定为每小时3.20英镑。
sentences.en: The minimum wage was set at £3.20 an hour .

sentences.cn: 我们是论小时获得报酬的。
sentences.en: We're paid by the hour .

sentences.cn: 他一小时后回来。
sentences.en: He'll be back in an hour .

sentences.cn: 我等了一个小时，然后就走了。
sentences.en: I waited for an hour and then I left.

sentences.cn: 那是三小时的考试。
sentences.en: It was a three-hour exam.

sentences.cn: 会见持续了半小时。
sentences.en: The interview lasted half an hour.

sentences.cn: 到那里大约需要一小时。
sentences.en: It will take about an hour to get there.

sentences.cn: 教师拒绝课余安排体育比赛，因为他们不会获得薪酬。
sentences.en: Teachers refused to run out of hours sports matches because they weren't being paid.

sentences.cn: 他和我妈妈每天晚上都吵个不停。
sentences.en: He and my mom were arguing every night, hour after hour.

sentences.cn: 吉布斯于昨天凌晨被捕。
sentences.en: Gibbs was arrested in the early hours of yesterday morning.

sentences.cn: 邻居的汽车警报器没日没夜响个不停。
sentences.en: ...a neighbour's car alarm going off at all hours of the day and night.

sentences.cn: 她不希望自己14岁的女儿凌晨才回家。
sentences.en: She didn't want her fourteen-year-old daughter coming home at all hours of the morning.

sentences.cn: 戴利在学生放学后继续开放学校，把它兼作社区中心。
sentences.en: Daly kept this school open after hours so it doubled as a community center.

sentences.cn: 钢厂工人下班后去放松一下的当地餐馆
sentences.en: ...a local restaurant where steel workers unwind after hours...

sentences.cn: 这份工作很轻松，工作时间也很合适。
sentences.en: The job was easy; the hours were good.

sentences.cn: 去那里要花很长时间。
sentences.en: Getting there would take hours.

sentences.cn: 处决他的时间
sentences.en: ...the hour of his execution...

sentences.cn: 即将到来的暴风雨使得天空看起来比平时这个时候更昏暗。
sentences.en: The gathering storm had made the day even darker than was usual at this hour.

sentences.cn: 他回忆起她在丈夫困难之时的忠贞奉献。
sentences.en: He recalled her devotion to her husband during his hour of need.

sentences.cn: 我职业生涯中最黑暗的时期
sentences.en: ...the darkest hour of my professional life.

sentences.en: I only slept about half an hour that night.

sentences.en: They waited for about two hours...

sentences.cn: 跑者的年度跨度下至四岁孩童,上至祖父母辈的老人；其时间跨度也从安德鲁.巴德利的世界纪录——13分48秒到一个小时不等。
sentences.en: Runners range from four year old to grandparents; their times range from Andrew Baddeley's world record 13 minutes 48 seconds up to an hour.

sentences.cn: 反对派称,每周运动至少两小时的小学生人数已几乎减半。
sentences.en: The opposition claims primary school pupils doing at least two hours of sport a week have nearly halved.

sentences.cn: 事实上，睡眠的重要性被低估了，以至于只睡几小时成了一件非常值得骄傲的事。
sentences.en: As it is , sleep is so undervalued that getting by on fewer hours has become a badge of honor.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 田纳西大学与田纳西州立大学相距仅几个小时的车程，而这两所学校值得做一下比较。
sentences.en: Located only a few hours apart, The University of Tennessee and Tennessee State are worth comparing.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 而 29% 的学生，也就是“具有无形风险的”群体，在其中三种危险行为上得分尤其高，分别是：他们每天花五小时或更多时间使用电子设备。
sentences.en: And 29%, the “invisible risk”group, scored  high  on  three  in  particular:  They  spent  five  hours a  day  or  more  on  electronic  devices.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 他们晚上只睡六小时或者更少。
sentences.en: They slept six hours a night or less.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在英国，毕业生每人平均背负 4.4万英镑的欠款，但是他们每周平均只能获得 14 个小时的授课和辅导时间。
sentences.en: In return for an average of £44,000 of debt, students get an average of only 14 hours of  lecture  and  tutorial  time  a  week  in  Britain.
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在七年级之后的暑假，学生们要在大学校园中花三个礼拜时间学习高等数学，每天要学七个小时。
sentences.en: The summer after 7th grade, students spend three weeks on a college campus studying advanced math for seven hours a day.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 在那几个小时里，我会沉浸在音乐里。
sentences.en: For those few hours, I can wrap myself up in my music.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 俄罗斯人还会在国际妇女节——犒劳女性亲属，为她们庆祝的节日——这天晚起一个小时。
sentences.en: Russians also get up an hour later on International Women’s Day, the day for treating and celebrating female relatives.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 然而和德国、意大利及法国的人们比起来，这也不算什么，他们在这个夏天的不同日子熬夜晚睡约一个半小时，就为了看世界杯。
sentences.en: That was nothing though, compared to Germans, Italians, and the French, who stayed up around an hour and a half later on various days throughout the summer to watch the Cup.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 男：一名印刷操作员晚到了一个半小时。
sentences.en: M: One of the press operators arrived an hour and a half late.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 天空登陆者10号在贝德福德郡的卡丁顿机场起飞，在空中飞行大约2小时。
sentences.en: The Airlander 10 spent nearly 2 hours in the air, having taken off from Cardington airfield in Bedfordshire
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 他花了一个钟头口述这封信.
sentences.en: It took him an hour to dictate this letter.

sentences.cn: 我们在机场等了一个钟头等后天晴.
sentences.en: We ent an hour in the airports waiting for the weather to clear.

sentences.cn: 过去他常常坐几个钟头什么事也不做.
sentences.en: He would sit for hours doing nothing.

sentences.cn: 药剂师还在为医生配方, 他说过半个钟头药就配好了.
sentences.en: The pharmaceutist is still making up the doctor's order, and says it will be ready in half an hour.

sentences.cn: 我回家需要一个多钟头.
sentences.en: It takes me more than an hour to get home.

sentences.cn: 我们坐在公园的长椅上谈论各自的生活,足足谈了两个钟头.
sentences.en: We sat on a park bench for two hours talking about our life.

sentences.cn: 他们发现要在一个钟头内把这一课都吸收是困难的.
sentences.en: They found it difficult to absorb the lesson in one hour.

sentences.cn: 你让我在这里傻等了整整一个钟头.
sentences.en: You've kept me waiting about here for a whole hour.

sentences.cn: 一个钟头过去需要很长很长的时间.
sentences.en: An hour was a long, long time in passing.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 他们在一片满目荒败的广漠平野上行驶了足有一个钟头.
sentences.en: For an hour they moved along vast desolated plain.

sentences.cn: 把狗放开, 它已被拴了好几个钟头了.
sentences.en: Release the dog. He has been chained up for hours.

sentences.cn: 几个钟头之后,克莱门扎就离开了.但忒希奥却一直没有出来.
sentences.en: Clemenza left after a few hours, but Tessio did not reappear.

sentences.cn: 今天一个钟头抵得上明天两个小时.
sentences.en: One hour today is worth two tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 理事们花了大半个钟头反复认真讨论了这个问题.
sentences.en: The trustees spent the best part of an hour chewing the matter over.

sentences.cn: 我们每天练一个钟头.
sentences.en: We practise ( it ) for an hour every day.

sentences.cn: 我希望晚几个钟头再下雨.
sentences.en: I hope that the rain will hold off for a few hours more.

sentences.cn: 两个钟头以前我就吃过早饭了.
sentences.en: I had breakfast two hours ago.

sentences.cn: 我们就此事辩论了好几个钟头.
sentences.en: We disputed on it for hours.

sentences.cn: 一个钟头过去, 又一个钟头过去了,谢辽日卡却仍然没来.
sentences.en: One hour passes , a second, and still Seryozhka does not come.

sentences.cn: 演说延长了两个钟头.
sentences.en: The speech dragged on for two hours.

sentences.cn: 于是一个钟头之后,罗吉·万帕就被选为队长, 代替那已死的古古密陀了.
sentences.en: An hour afterwards Luigi Vampa was chosen captain, vice Cucumetto deceased.

sentences.cn: 会议时间提前了一个钟头.
sentences.en: The time of the meeting was advanced by an hour.

sentences.cn: 我们已经在沙滩上躺了两个钟头了, 你感觉如何?
sentences.en: We've been lying on the beach for two hours. How do you feel?

sentences.cn: 你想和我一道去 吗 ?坐火车去只要1个半钟头.
sentences.en: Will you come with me? It's only an hour and a half in the train.

sentences.cn: 我们已等了大半个钟头.
sentences.en: We have been waiting for the better part of an hour.

sentences.cn: 大夫允许她每天起来两个钟头.
sentences.en: The doctor allows her up for two hours each day.

sentences.cn: 这伙人安顿下来已经快一个钟头了.
sentences.en: Almost an hour had passed since the group had settled down.

sentences.cn: 又过了半个钟头, 他们的搜索仍然毫无结果.
sentences.en: Another half an hour passed, and the pursuit was still fruitless.

sentences.cn: 这有一个钟头之久.
sentences.en: It's an hour long.

sentences.cn: 她这么丧魂落魄已有半个钟头了.
sentences.en: She must have been half an hour in this delirious condition.

sentences.cn: 花了好长时间才到达那里。
sentences.en: It took hours getting there.

sentences.cn: 现在于办公时间以外顾客可以用电邮和我们联系。
sentences.en: Clients can now contact us by email out of hours (= when the office is closed) .

sentences.cn: 这是酒吧正常关门时间之后唯一能喝一杯的地方。
sentences.en: This is the only place to get a drink after hours (= after the normal closing time for pubs) .

sentences.cn: 英国的酒吧营业时间从前受到很严格的限制。
sentences.en: Britain's licensing hours (= when pubs are allowed to open) used to be very restricted.

sentences.en: a hospital's visiting hours

sentences.en: Most people in this kind of job tend to work long hours .

sentences.en: Opening hours are from 10 to 6 each day.

sentences.cn: 研究人员还指出，准备共享数据以供他人查看的过程需要耗费很多时间。一旦数据和相关材料出现在存储库，答疑和处理投诉就会花费大量时间。
sentences.en: I) Researchers also point to the time sink that is involved in preparing data for others to view. Once the data and associated materials appear in a repository answering questions and handling complaints can take many hours.
sentences.from: 17年12月六级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 网上超市的主要用户包括老年人，工作时间久的人以及那些自己没车的人。
sentences.en: Typical users of online supermarkets include the elderly, people who work long hours and those without their own transport.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 为了实行这项方案，政府必须 工资补贴来弥补由于工作时间缩短而损失的工资。
sentences.en: For this scheme to work, the government must provide wage subsidies to compensate for lost pay due to the shorter hours.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: “奖励也可以是弹性工作时间。”
sentences.en: “Rewards can be flexible working hours.”
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 她以为她生命的最后时刻到了。
sentences.en: She thought her last hour had come.

sentences.cn: 在《时时刻刻》一片中, 妮可?基德曼出演知名作家维吉妮雅?沃尔芙.
sentences.en: In The Hours, Nicole Kidman plays the famous writer Virginia Woolf.

sentences.cn: 你可知道当死亡在陌生的时刻来临之时是显得多么苍白、放荡、令人颤栗?
sentences.en: Do you know how pale and wanton thrillful comes death on a strange hour?

sentences.cn: 她想的不是过去, 而是未来,那即将到来的,逐渐临近的时刻.
sentences.en: She was not turned to the past, but to the immediate, impending hour.

sentences.cn: 黎明之前,是最黑暗的时刻.
sentences.en: The darkest hour comes before dawn.

sentences.cn: 就像北京高峰时刻的地铁一样, 或者像客流量大时的王府井大街!
sentences.en: It was like the Beijing subway at rush hours, or the Wangfujing Street on shopping day!

sentences.cn: 随着睡觉时间的来临,随着出现幻象的时刻的临近,我就变得紧张起来.
sentences.en: I grew nervous as bedtime approached and the hour of the vision drew near.

sentences.cn: 客人应邀在不正常的时刻前来吃喝.
sentences.en: One is called on to eat and drink at unnatural hours.

sentences.cn: 一天当中,我们时时刻刻都有事干, 都抱着希望,都有所操心, 都在奔忙.
sentences.en: There was employment , hope, solicitude , bustle, for every hour of the day.

sentences.cn: 在最需要的时刻他背信弃义地抛弃朋友.
sentences.en: He faithlessly forsook his friends in their hour of need.

sentences.cn: 这是我最得意的时刻.
sentences.en: This was my finest hour.

sentences.cn: 我将是你最黑暗时刻的启明星. 我将改变你的人生.
sentences.en: I'll be your light in your darkest hour. I'm gonna change your life.

sentences.cn: 你今天早上是准时上班, 还是被尖峰时刻的塞车给耽误了?
sentences.en: Did you get to work on time this morning, or did rush hour traffic delay you?

sentences.cn: 好了, 毕业舞会开始的时刻差不多到了.
sentences.en: Well, it's almost zero hour for the graduation party.

sentences.cn: 在某一天的某一时刻, 我们将会抵达进站!
sentences.en: On a certain day at a certain hour, we will pull into the station.

sentences.cn: 30我们又因 何时刻 冒险呢.
sentences.en: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?

sentences.cn: 在我黑暗的时刻里.
sentences.en: And in my hour of darkness.

sentences.cn: 难道倒霉的时刻终于要来了 吗 ?
sentences.en: Had the hour of adversity come?

sentences.cn: 另一部电影《时时刻刻》获得了9项提名, 其中包括最佳影片奖.
sentences.en: A film called The Hours received nine nominations, including Best Picture.

sentences.cn: 我在等待时机,报仇的时刻就要到了.
sentences.en: I bide my time and the hour of vengeance is nigh.

sentences.cn: 自今年的圣诞到明年此刻, 愿你时时刻刻都幸福欢乐!
sentences.en: From this Christmas till the next one, may every day hold happy hours for you!

sentences.cn: 她在凌晨三点的荒唐时刻叫我起来.
sentences.en: She woke me up at the unholy hour of three in the morning.

sentences.cn: 就在这大约同一时刻, 经过长长一晚上的忧思, 敏妮正在酣睡.
sentences.en: At about that hour, Minnie was soundly sleeping, after a long evening of troubled thought.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 她睡过了平时起床的时刻.
sentences.en: She overslept the usual hour of rising.

sentences.cn: 每天任何时刻列车都吼叫着在这个城市进进出出.
sentences.en: Trains roared in and out of the town at all hours.

sentences.cn: 在长久的暴政与短暂的抗战之后,我们迎来了自由的时刻.
sentences.en: It was the hour of freedom after a long tyranny and a very tough fight.

sentences.cn: 他可能要在第二天下午的某个时刻回来.
sentences.en: He would probably return by a certain hour in the afternoon of the morrow.

sentences.cn: 他们的计划在最后时刻被取消了.
sentences.en: Their plan was called off at the eleventh hour.

sentences.cn: 第二次令人难忘的时刻发生在五个小时之后的撑杆跳场地上.
sentences.en: The second unforgettable moment came five hours later at the pole vault pit.

sentences.cn: 一场看来即将爆发的战争, 在最后时刻被制止了.
sentences.en: War , which seemed certain, was prevented at the eleventh hour.

sentences.cn: 用于学术研究的公共资金不断增长，加快了专业化过程：从19660到1990年，联邦研究经费增加了四倍，但教师授课时长减少了一般，因为研究工作产生了负面影响。
sentences.en: The growth in public money for academic research has speeded the process: federal research grants rose fourfold between 1960 and 1990, but faculty teaching hours fell by half as research took its toll.
